Body:
sino, angles = create_test_sino_3d()
parameters = get_test_parameter_set(2)
r = list()
for p in parameters:
    f = odtbrain.backpropagate_3d(sino, angles, dtype=np.float32, padval=0, **p
        )
    r.append(cutout(f))
data32 = np.array(r).flatten().view(np.float32)
data64 = test_3d_backprop_phase()
assert np.allclose(data32, data64, atol=6e-07, rtol=0)
